prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with elegant blue armor and graceful movements.
I want a fighting-type Pokemon that embodies honor and skill with a noble stance.
Generate a Pokemon that combines psychic and fighting attributes with a sleek design.
Make a Pokemon that showcases bravery and determination in its battle stance.
Imagine a Pokemon characterized by its swift motions and agile attacks.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and has a noble appearance.
Show me a Pokemon with a strong connection to nature and a fierce combat style.
